title: 📝 Draft templates for amendments to agreements
rss_title: 🗳️  📝 Draft templates for amendments to agreements
author: ebullient
content:
[![🗳️ Vote progress](https://www.commonhaus.org/votes/commonhaus/foundation/260.svg)](https://github.com/commonhaus/foundation/pull/260#issuecomment-2845217726 "IC_kwDOKRPTI86plpO-")

These will serve as amendments for agreements (to add additional assets owned by an assignor, or to add/remove signatories).

voting group: @commonhaus/cf-egc 

Do one of the following:

- Approve the PR or react with 👍 (:+1:) if it looks good to you
- Review with Comments or react with 👀 (:eyes:) if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- If you think it needs discussion or revision
    - Create a review, add your comments and require changes
    - Use the +- button to make a suggestion (instead of just adding a comment).
